translation.en: ( knocking ) - GERALD TATE'S HERE. HE WANTS TO KNOW WHAT'S HAPPENING TO HIS DEAL.
translation.zh: 杰拉德·泰特来了他想知道他的合同出了什么问题

translation.en: - GO GET HARVEY.
translation.zh: 把哈维找来

translation.en: - TRUST ME, I CAN HANDLE GERALD TATE.
translation.zh: 相信我 我能应付杰拉德·泰特

translation.en: - I'M SORRY, YOU SAY THE BET'S TO ME?
translation.zh: 抱歉 你说对我下注了

translation.en: - HARVEY, WHEN ARE YOU GONNA LEAVE PEARSON AND WORK FOR A MAN?
translation.zh: 哈维 你打算什么时候离开皮尔逊为男人工作

translation.en: - I'LL LEAVE JESSICA ANYTIME YOU WANT.
translation.zh: 我可以随时离开杰西卡

translation.en: YOU JUST HAVE TO FORMALLY ASK.
translation.zh: 你只要正式邀请我

translation.en: THEN, AFTER THAT, WHY DON'T YOU
translation.zh: 在那之后你在正式请圣诞老人

translation.en: FORMALLY ASK SANTA CLAUS TO BRING YOU A PONY,
translation.zh: 在那之后你在正式请圣诞老人 给你带匹小马驹因为我不会离开杰西卡的

translation.en: 'CAUSE I'M NOT LEAVING JESSICA. I CHECK.
translation.zh: 给你带匹小马驹因为我不会离开杰西卡的 下注

translation.en: - RAISE. FIVE THOUSAND.
translation.zh: 加注 5000元

translation.en: - I'M ALL-IN.
translation.zh: 全押

translation.en: YOU CAN PAY ME LATER. I GOT TO GO.
translation.zh: 钱你可以晚点再付 我先走一步

translation.en: GENTLEMEN.
translation.zh: 各位 失陪

translation.en: - I'M PAYING YOU MILLIONS,
translation.zh: 我付了你那么多钱

translation.en: AND YOU'RE TELLING ME I'M GONNA GET SCREWED?
translation.zh: 你却跟我说这份合同签不成了吗

translation.en: - JESSICA, HAVE I COME AT A BAD TIME?
translation.zh: 杰西卡 我来的不是时候吗

translation.en: - GERALD, THIS IS HARVEY SPECTER.
translation.zh: 杰拉德 这是哈维·斯佩克特

translation.en: HE'S OUR BEST CLOSER.
translation.zh: 我们这里最棒的律师

translation.en: - WELL, IF YOU'RE THE BEST CLOSER,
translation.zh: 既然你是这里最棒的律师

translation.en: WHERE THE HELL YOU BEEN FOR THE LAST THREE HOURS?
translation.zh: 那你之前三小时跑哪去了

translation.en: - WELL, GERALD, I SPECIALIZE IN TROUBLED SITUATIONS,
translation.zh: 杰拉德 我专攻疑难案件

translation.en: AND WHEN I LEFT HERE AT 7:00 P.M., THIS DEAL WASN'T IN JEOPARDY,
translation.zh: 我今晚七点走的时候 合同还谈得好好的

translation.en: SO I'M JUST TRYING TO FIGURE OUT WHAT HAPPENED IN THE INTERIM.
translation.zh: 我想知道在这期间都发生了什么

translation.en: - WE KEEP OFFERING MORE MONEY. THEY KEEP REJECTING IT.
translation.zh: 我们不断提高价码 他们一直不肯接受

translation.en: IT'S LAST-MINUTE BAD FAITH BULLSHIT.
translation.zh: 他们在最后时刻使诈变卦

translation.en: - SAYS HERE THAT COOPER WON'T BE STAYING ON
translation.zh: 这上面说库珀不会继续担任

translation.en: AS HONORARY VICE PRESIDENT.
translation.zh: 名誉副总裁一职

translation.en: - THAT'S RIGHT. I DON'T WANT HIM AROUND.
translation.zh: 没错 我想把他踢出去

translation.en: - HE WOULDN'T BE AROUND.
translation.zh: 本来就没他的事

translation.en: IT'S AN HONORARY POSITION.
translation.zh: 他只是名誉上的副总裁

translation.en: - I DON'T GIVE A SHIT.
translation.zh: 我才不管

translation.en: - WELL, I THINK YOU DO,
translation.zh: 你不能不管 因为这就是我离开后发生的变化

translation.en: BECAUSE THAT'S WHAT'S CHANGED SINCE I LEFT,
translation.zh: 因为这就是我离开后发生的变化 也就是说使诈的人是你

translation.en: WHICH MEANS IT'S YOU WHO'S BEEN DEALING IN BAD FAITH.
translation.zh: 也就是说使诈的人是你

translation.en: - WELL, NOW THAT YOU'VE GOT A GRASP ON WHAT'S HAPPENED
translation.zh: 既然你已经知道了你不在的时候

translation.en: IN THE GODDAMN INTERIM,
translation.zh: 发生了什么情况

translation.en: WHAT ARE YOU GONNA DO ABOUT IT?
translation.zh: 你准备怎么办

translation.en: BECAUSE HE'S NOT GETTING THAT TITLE.
translation.zh: 反正他别想拿到那个头衔

translation.en: - WELL, LET ME MAKE SURE I UNDERSTAND THIS, OKAY?
translation.zh: 先让我理一下思路 好吗

translation.en: WE NEGOTIATED A DEAL THAT GAVE YOU EVERYTHING YOU WANTED,
translation.zh: 我们商拟的合同 满足了你的一切要求

translation.en: MR. COOPER SIGNED IT, AND NOW YOU WON'T CLOSE
translation.zh: 库珀先生也签字同意了 现在不让他尊严扫地

translation.en: UNTIL WE TAKE AWAY THE LAST SHRED OF HIS DIGNITY?
translation.zh: 你就绝不善罢甘休吗

translation.en: - BINGO. - WELL, THAT'S NOT GONNA HAPPEN.
translation.zh: -没错-那绝无可能

translation.en: - AND WHY THE HELL NOT? - BECAUSE I LIKE MR. COOPER,
translation.zh: 为什么不行 因为我喜欢库珀先生

translation.en: AND MY FIRM DOESN'T OPERATE IN BAD FAITH.
translation.zh: 因为我喜欢库珀先生 而且我们公司从不使诈

translation.en: - OH. I SEE HOW IT IS.
translation.zh: 我看出来了

translation.en: INSTEAD OF WORKING COOPER, YOU'RE WORKING ME.
translation.zh: 你不去说服库珀 反而来给我做工作

translation.en: WELL, WHY DON'T YOU TAKE YOUR PANSY ATTITUDE
translation.zh: 有本事你就用这娘娘腔的语气

translation.en: BACK IN THERE AND MAKE HIM SIGN MY DEAL?
translation.zh: 说服他签了我的合同

translation.en: OR I'LL PAY SOMEONE ELSE YOUR MONEY TO DO IT FOR ME.
translation.zh: 不然我就雇别的律师帮我搞定

translation.en: - FIRST OF ALL, GERALD,
translation.zh: 首先 杰拉德

translation.en: IF YOU THINK ANYONE'S GONNA TOUCH THIS DEAL
translation.zh: 如果你觉得别人 在知道你使诈的情况下

translation.en: AFTER YOUR BAD FAITH, YOU'RE MISTAKEN.
translation.zh: 还会接这个案子 那你就大错特错了

translation.en: SECOND, THE WAY OUR AGREEMENT WORKS IS,
translation.zh: 其次 我们的协议上说的是

translation.en: THE MINUTE COOPER SIGNED THE DEAL
translation.zh: 一旦库珀签署了合同

translation.en: WHICH GAVE YOU EVERYTHING YOU WANTED,
translation.zh: 你得到了想要的一切

translation.en: OUR FEE WAS DUE AND PAYABLE, WHICH IS WHY AT 7:30
translation.zh: 就会如期支付我们酬金 这也就是为何在七点半的时候

translation.en: I RECEIVED CONFIRMATION OF A WIRE TRANSFER
translation.zh: 我收到一份由第三方出具的

translation.en: FROM ESCROW INDICATING PAYMENT IN FULL.
translation.zh: 全额付讫的电汇凭据

translation.en: SO I'D SAY THE BALL'S IN YOUR COURT,
translation.zh: 所以说该你做决定了

translation.en: BUT THE TRUTH IS YOUR BALLS ARE IN MY FIST.
translation.zh: 但事实上你没得选

translation.en: NOW I APOLOGIZE IF THAT IMAGE IS TOO PANSY FOR YOU,
translation.zh: 很抱歉我对你来说太娘了

translation.en: BUT I'M COMFORTABLE ENOUGH WITH MY MANHOOD
translation.zh: 但我倒觉得我的男子气概

translation.en: TO PUT IT OUT THERE.
translation.zh: 恰到好处

translation.en: NOW GET YOUR ASS IN THERE AND CLOSE THE GODDAMN DEAL.
translation.zh: 所以给我立马过去完成那次该死的交易

translation.en: - YOU GONNA LET HIM TALK TO ME LIKE THIS?
translation.zh: 你就让他用这种口气跟我说话吗 哈维即代表事务所

translation.en: - HARVEY SPEAKS FOR THE FIRM.
translation.zh: 哈维即代表事务所

translation.en: WE GOT PAID BEFORE GERALD SIGNED THE DEAL?
translation.zh: 杰拉德签合同之前 我们就收到钱了吗

translation.en: - WHAT ARE YOU TALKING ABOUT? THIS IS A MEMO
translation.zh: 你还真信啊 这是周二消防演习的注意事项

translation.en: ABOUT SOME FIRE DRILL ON TUESDAY.
translation.zh: 这是周二消防演习的注意事项

translation.en: - HUH. - YOU'RE THE BLUE TEAM CAPTAIN. YOU GET TO WEAR A FIRE HAT.
translation.zh: 你是蓝队队长你得戴消防帽

translation.en: - TIME'S UP.
translation.zh: 时间到全部停笔

translation.en: PENCILS DOWN.
translation.zh: 法学院入学考试

translation.en: EXCUSE ME. DO I KNOW YOU FROM SOMEWHERE?
translation.zh: 请问我之前见过你吗

translation.en: - NO, I DON'T THINK SO.
translation.zh: 应该没有

translation.en: I HAVE A PRETTY GOOD MEMORY FOR FACES.
translation.zh: 我对人脸过目不忘

translation.en: - SO DO I.
translation.zh: 我也是

translation.en: - SORRY. - I GOT IT.
translation.zh: -抱歉 -没事

translation.en: HEY, STOP! YOU IN THE CAP!
translation.zh: 站住 戴帽子的

translation.en: - WHAT DID YOU GET ME?
translation.zh: 你考了几分

translation.en: - WHAT I SAID I WAS GONNA GET YOU.
translation.zh: 就跟我之前说的一样

translation.en: A 158. - I TOLD YOU I WANTED A 175.
translation.zh: 158分 我说了我要175分

translation.en: - AND I TOLD YOU ONLY ONE OUT OF 100 PEOPLE CAN SCORE THAT.
translation.zh: 我也说了 只有1%的人 能考到那分数

translation.en: YOU'RE A B-MINUS STUDENT. YOU GOT 1,000 ON YOUR SATs.
translation.zh: 你是个中等偏下的学生 高考只考了1000分

translation.en: IF I GET YOU A 175, THEY'LL KNOW YOU CHEATED.
translation.zh: 如果我帮你考了175分他们肯定知道你作弊了

translation.en: - SO ONLY A GENIUS LOSER CAN GET A 175?
translation.zh: 所以只有你这种天才败类才能得175分吗

translation.en: - ( sighs ) ACTUALLY, NO. I WOULD GET A 180.
translation.zh: 所以只有你这种天才败类才能得175分吗 不 其实我能考180分

translation.en: NOW CAN I HAVE MY MONEY, PLEASE?
translation.zh: 现在能付我钱了吗

translation.en: WHOA. THIS IS ONLY HALF.
translation.zh: 这只是一半的钱

translation.en: - THEN WHY DON'T YOU GO CALL THE POLICE?
translation.zh: 这只是一半的钱 那你去报警啊

translation.en: - ( groans ) I GOT TO GET MY SHIT TOGETHER.
translation.zh: 今天一天倒霉透了

translation.en: - THAT'S THE BEST CHEESEBURGER I'VE HAD IN MY LIFE.
translation.zh: 那是我有生以来吃过的最棒的芝士汉堡

translation.en: - IT'S FROM MONDAY, TREVOR.
translation.zh: 那汉堡星期一就买了 特雷弗

translation.en: LOOK, MAN, I'M SERIOUS. I ALMOST GOT CAUGHT TODAY.
translation.zh: 听着 哥们 说真的 我今天差点被活捉

translation.en: I'VE GOT TO STOP GETTING STONED.
translation.zh: 我不能再吸大麻了

translation.en: I'VE GOT TO GET MY ACT TOGETHER.
translation.zh: 得干点正经事

translation.en: - DUDE, LOOK AT ME.
translation.zh: 哥们 听我说

translation.en: YOU CAN BURN BUD AND STILL BE A SUCCESS.
translation.zh: 吸点大麻不影响你走向成功

translation.en: - YOU SELL POT FOR A LIVING.
translation.zh: 你以卖大麻为生 当然会那么说

translation.en: - STILL SAPS THE MOTIVATION.
translation.zh: 你别打击我的积极性

translation.en: ALL I'M SAYING IS, YOU WANT IN,
translation.zh: 我说了 你要是想入伙

translation.en: YOU ARE IN.
translation.zh: 随时都行

translation.en: - YOU KNOW, THAT IS WORD FOR WORD
translation.zh: 随时都行 你记得三年级的时候

translation.en: YOUR OFFER BEFORE I GOT CAUGHT
translation.zh: 我代你考数学

translation.en: CHEATING ON YOUR MATH TEST IN THE THIRD GRADE.
translation.zh: 我代你考数学 在被抓之前 你也是这么说的

translation.en: - GODDAMN MEMORY.
translation.zh: 多美好的回忆啊

translation.en: - STOP.
translation.zh: 打住

translation.en: - LOOK, NO ONE'S GONNA SUSPECT YOU'RE A DEALER.
translation.zh: 听着 没人会怀疑你是个毒贩子

translation.en: I MEAN, LOOK AT ME. THIS IS A $2,000 SUIT, MIKE.
translation.zh: 真的 你看看我 这件西装值两千块 迈克

translation.en: I GOT, LIKE, 12 OF 'EM.
translation.zh: 我差不多有12件

translation.en: I TAKE ON REAL SOFTWARE PROJECTS.
translation.zh: 我差不多有12件 我可是正正经经在做"软件项目"

translation.en: I HAVE CLIENTS WHO BRING ME BRIEFCASES FILLED WITH CASH,
translation.zh: 客户们交给我装满现金的公文箱

translation.en: AND I HAND THEM IDENTICAL BRIEFCASES
translation.zh: 我拿外表相同

translation.en: WITH VACUUM-SEALED BUD.
translation.zh: 装有真空包装大麻的箱子去换

translation.en: I'M TELLING YOU, MAN, HIDE IN PLAIN SIGHT.
translation.zh: 我告诉你 大隐隐于市

translation.en: - OKAY, SO WHAT DO YOU NEED ME FOR?
translation.zh: 那你还要我做什么

translation.en: - WELL, I HAVE A CLIENT COMING IN FROM OUT OF TOWN,
translation.zh: 我有个从外地来的客户

translation.en: AND I CAN'T MEET HIM,
translation.zh: 我没法去见他

translation.en: AND I NEED SOMEONE I CAN TRUST TO MAKE THE DROP.
translation.zh: 我得找个信得过的人去完成交易

translation.en: IT'S TOTALLY SAFE.
translation.zh: 放心 绝对安全

translation.en: COME ON, HELP A BROTHER OUT.
translation.zh: 行吗

translation.en: - TREVOR, A PERSON IS MORE LIKELY TO DIE
translation.zh: 特雷弗 在德州

translation.en: WHILE DEALING DRUGS THAN THEY WOULD BE ON DEATH ROW... IN TEXAS.
translation.zh: 毒贩子比死刑犯还容易丧命

translation.en: - WAIT. WHAT ARE YOU TALKING ABOUT?
translation.zh: 慢着 你在说什么

translation.en: - IT'S FROM FREAKONOMICS.
translation.zh: 《魔鬼经济学》里说的

translation.en: DO YOU READ ANYTHING THAT I GIVE YOU?
translation.zh: 你有没有看过我给你的书啊

translation.en: IT DOESN'T MATTER,
translation.zh: 你有没有看过我给你的书啊 无所谓了

translation.en: BECAUSE YOU HAVE TO FIND SOMEBODY ELSE. I'M NOT INTERESTED.
translation.zh: 你还是去找别人吧 我没兴趣

translation.en: - NOT INTERESTED IN WHAT? - WHAT ARE YOU DOING HERE?
translation.zh: 对什么没兴趣

translation.en: YOU SAID YOU WERE GONNA STAY AT YOUR PLACE TONIGHT.
translation.zh: 你怎么来了你不是说今晚待在自己家吗

translation.en: - HI, SWEETIE.
translation.zh: 你怎么来了你不是说今晚待在自己家吗 亲爱的

translation.en: WHAT A PLEASANT SURPRISE.
translation.zh: 太惊喜了

translation.en: I'M SO GLAD YOU STOPPED BY. - YEAH.
translation.zh: 你能过来我太高兴了

translation.en: WE'RE IN THE MIDDLE OF SOMETHING.
translation.zh: 我们在谈正事

translation.en: - WHAT ARE YOU IN THE MIDDLE OF?
translation.zh: 什么正事

translation.en: - TREVOR'S TRYING TO SET ME UP.
translation.zh: 特雷弗想给我牵线搭桥

translation.en: - THAT'S TERRIFIC.
translation.zh: 很好啊

translation.en: UH, WHO'S THE-- THE LUCKY GIRL?
translation.zh: 哪个女孩这么走运

translation.en: - I'M TRYING TO GET HIM TO WORK FOR ME.
translation.zh: 我是想让他为我工作

translation.en: - THAT'S A GREAT IDEA.
translation.zh: 我是想让他为我工作 这主意不错

translation.en: IT WILL TAKE SOME STRESS OFF TREVOR,
translation.zh: 可以给特雷弗减轻不少压力

translation.en: AND YOU'LL PICK UP WRITING CODE LIKE YOU DO EVERYTHING ELSE.
translation.zh: 你学什么都轻而易举 学编程也没什么问题

translation.en: - ALL RIGHT. I GOT TO GO.
translation.zh: 好吧 我得走了

translation.en: I GOT GO GET UP EARLY TO SEE MY GRANDMOTHER
translation.zh: 我明天得起个大早去看我奶奶

translation.en: AND PAY THEM ANOTHER MONTH.
translation.zh: 给她付下个月的住院费

translation.en: - GOOD NIGHT. - BYE.
translation.zh: -晚安 -拜

translation.en: - HOW DID YOU KNOW GERALD WOULDN'T LOOK AT THAT MEMO?
translation.zh: 你怎么知道杰拉德不会看那张纸呢

translation.en: - BECAUSE A CHARGING BULL ALWAYS LOOKS AT THE RED CAPE,
translation.zh: 因为被激怒的公牛 只会盯着红色斗篷

translation.en: NOT AT THE MAN WITH THE SWORD.
translation.zh: 只会盯着红色斗篷 而不是斗牛士本身

translation.en: - BY THE WAY, I'VE SET UP A MEETING
translation.zh: 而不是斗牛士本身 对了 我安排了你下周和约翰·多克利碰个面

translation.en: FOR YOU AND JOHN DOCKERY NEXT WEEK.
translation.zh: 对了 我安排了你下周和约翰·多克利碰个面

translation.en: - DOCKERY? HE'S SKADDEN'S BIGGEST CLIENT.
translation.zh: 对了 我安排了你下周和约翰·多克利碰个面 多克利 斯凯登律师亊务所最大的客户吗

translation.en: - NOT ANYMORE. HE'S LOOKING AROUND.
translation.zh: 多克利 斯凯登律师亊务所最大的客户吗 那是过去

translation.en: HE WANTS US TO ASSESS WHERE HE'S VULNERABLE TO A TAKEOVER.
translation.zh: 他正在找新的代理律师 他想让我们评估他的弱点

translation.en: HE PLAYS TENNIS. I WANT YOU TO CLOSE HIM.
translation.zh: 他常打网球我要你去拉他做我们的客户

translation.en: - CONSIDER IT DONE.
translation.zh: 他常打网球我要你去拉他做我们的客户 使命必达

translation.en: - THEN YOU ARE OFFICIALLY DISMISSED
translation.zh: 使命必达 那你今晚的任务

translation.en: FOR THE EVENING. - CHEERS.
translation.zh: 那你今晚的任务 算圆满完成了

translation.en: - WELL, YOU TWO SEEM TO BE CELEBRATING SOMETHING.
translation.zh: 干杯 你们俩好像在庆祝什么吧

translation.en: - MM-HMM. WE ARE.
translation.zh: 你们俩好像在庆祝什么吧 是的 没错

translation.en: IN FACT, YOU ARE LOOKING
translation.zh: 其实眼前这位

translation.en: AT THE BEST CLOSER THIS CITY HAS EVER SEEN.
translation.zh: 是这个城市前所未见的顶尖高手

translation.en: - CLOSER, HUH?
translation.zh: 高手

translation.en: BASEBALL? - ATTORNEY.
translation.zh: 高手 -棒球高手吗-我是律师

translation.en: I CLOSE SITUATIONS.
translation.zh: 是个结案高手

translation.en: - HMM. SO YOU ONLY CARE ABOUT MONEY?
translation.zh: 是个结案高手 所以说你眼里只有钱咯

translation.en: - THE TRUTH IS, I DO IT FOR THE CHILDREN.
translation.zh: 所以说你眼里只有钱咯 其实我挣钱是为了下一代

translation.en: - ( chuckles )
translation.zh: 其实我挣钱是为了下一代

translation.en: I'M LISA.
translation.zh: 我叫丽莎

translation.en: - HARVEY.
translation.zh: 我是哈维

translation.en: LISA, I DON'T NORMALLY DO THIS,
translation.zh: 丽莎 我一般不这样问

translation.en: BUT SINCE WE ARE CELEBRATING,
translation.zh: 但既然正值庆祝之际

translation.en: WHAT TIME DO YOU GET OFF TONIGHT?
translation.zh: 但既然正值庆祝之际 请问你今晚几点下班呢

translation.en: - GLAD YOU ASKED.
translation.zh: 很高兴你问了

translation.en: I GET OFF AT TEN PAST "I'M NEVER GOING OUT WITH YOU."
translation.zh: 很高兴你问了 我要十点后才下班 我绝不会和你约会

translation.en: - I GUESS YOU'RE NOT THE BEST CLOSER THIS CITY'S EVER SEEN. ( upbeat music )
translation.zh: 看来高手也有被拒的时候

translation.en: - MORNING. - LISA, THIS WAS LOVELY,
translation.zh: -早安-丽莎 有你真好

translation.en: BUT I'M AFRAID IT'S TIME TO GO.
translation.zh: 但恐怕你得走了

translation.en: - AW, CAN'T WE HANG OUT? I CAN MAKE YOU BREAKFAST.
translation.zh: 我们不能一起吗 我可以给你做早餐

translation.en: - I HATE TO MISS A WORKOUT,
translation.zh: 我每天必须健身

translation.en: AND I REALLY NEED TO BE IN THE OFFICE BY 7:30.
translation.zh: 七点半前我得赶到办公室

translation.en: - MM, THAT'S TOO BAD,
translation.zh: 七点半前我得赶到办公室 真可惜 因为我在想

translation.en: 'CAUSE I WAS KIND OF THINKING
translation.zh: 真可惜 因为我在想

translation.en: MAYBE YOU COULD EAT IT OFF MY STOMACH.
translation.zh: 真可惜 因为我在想 你可以在我肚子上慢慢享用

translation.en: - I GUESS IF I SKIP THE GYM, I CAN STILL GET IN BY 9:00.
translation.zh: 如果我不去健身房我还是可以赶在九点前去上班的

translation.en: - I HEAR SOMEONE'S NOT TAKING THEIR PILLS.
translation.zh: 我听说有人不吃药了

translation.en: - BECAUSE THEY'RE TRYING TO POISON ME.
translation.zh: 因为他们想给我下毒

translation.en: - GRAMMY, THAT'S CRAZY.
translation.zh: 奶奶 这不可能

translation.en: DR. SHRAGER GAVE ME HER WORD

translation.en: - JESSICA, IF YOU HADN'T DONE AS MUCH FOR ME AS YOU HAVE,

translation.en: ARE HOW WE, AS A FIRM, SHOW THAT WE CARE

translation.zh: 五套

translation.en: WHAT?
translation.zh: 怎么了

translation.en: - NANCY?
translation.zh: 南希

translation.en: - MIKE? - YEAH, HI.
translation.zh: -迈克-没错 你好

translation.en: - YOU'RE A KID.
translation.zh: 你还是个孩子啊

translation.zh: 你还是个孩子啊 不 我...我是个成年人

translation.zh: 你太瘦了

translation.zh: 他们给你吃饭吗

translation.en: HERE, HAVE A GRAPE.
translation.zh: 吃点葡萄吧

translation.en: - THANK YOU.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: WHY DON'T YOU TELL ME YOUR STORY?
translation.zh: 给我讲讲你的故事吧

translation.en: - IT STARTED TWO YEARS AGO.
translation.zh: 是两年前开始的

translation.en: I WAS A STAY-AT-HOME MOM
translation.zh: 是两年前开始的 我当时是全职妈妈

translation.en: TO MY SON, FREDDIE.
translation.zh: 在家照顾我儿子 弗雷迪

translation.en: AND ONE DAY WE WERE AT LITTLE LEAGUE--
translation.zh: 有一天我们

translation.en: FREDDIE WAS FIVE, AND HE REALLY HATED
translation.zh: 在参加一个小型棒球联赛 弗雷迪当时五岁

translation.en: THAT HE COULDN'T PLAY WITH THE OLDER KIDS--
translation.zh: 不能跟大孩子玩 他很不爽

translation.en: IT WAS THE THIRD INNING, AND I GOT A PHONE CALL.
translation.zh: 第三局的时候 我接到一通电话

translation.en: MY HUSBAND HAD BEEN IN A CAR ACCIDENT,
translation.zh: 我丈夫出了车祸

translation.en: AND HE WAS GONE, JUST LIKE THAT.
translation.zh: 就那么撒手走了

translation.en: - I'M SO SORRY.
translation.zh: 我很遗憾

translation.en: - I DID THE BEST I COULD.
translation.zh: 我尽了自己最大的努力

translation.en: I GOT MYSELF A JOB AS A SECRETARY
translation.zh: 我尽了自己最大的努力 我在德夫林·迈克雷格找到了

translation.en: AT DEVLIN MCGREGGOR.
translation.zh: 我在德夫林·迈克雷格找到了 一份秘书的工作

translation.en: AND I EVEN GOT PROMOTED TO SECRETARY OF THE PRESIDENT,
translation.zh: 我甚至升职当上了总裁秘书

translation.en: CHARLES HUNT.
translation.zh: 他叫查尔斯·亨特

translation.en: AND THAT'S WHEN IT ALL CHANGED.
translation.zh: 从那时候起 一切都变了

translation.en: - IT'S OKAY. TELL ME WHAT HAPPENED.
translation.zh: 没关系的 告诉我发生了什么事

translation.en: - HE STARTED ASKING ME TO STAY LATE,
translation.zh: 他开始要求我加班

translation.en: ORDER IN DINNERS TOGETHER, STUFF LIKE THAT.
translation.zh: 他开始要求我加班 一起叫外卖当晚餐之类的

translation.en: ONE NIGHT, HE SAYS THAT IF I SLEEP WITH HIM,
translation.zh: 有天晚上 他说如果我陪他睡觉

translation.en: HE'S GONNA TAKE CARE OF ME IN THE FIRM,
translation.zh: 有天晚上 他说如果我陪他睡觉 他就会在公司里关照我

translation.en: AND, IF I DON'T, HE'S GONNA FIRE ME.
translation.zh: 他就会在公司里关照我 要是我不从 他就会开除我

translation.en: - SO WHAT DID YOU DO?
translation.zh: 那你是怎么做的

translation.en: - I WENT TO HUMAN RESOURCES.
translation.zh: 我去了人力资源部

translation.en: THEY SAID THEY INVESTIGATED,
translation.zh: 我去了人力资源部 他们说调查过了

translation.en: COULDN'T FIND ANYTHING TO SUPPORT MY CLAIM.
translation.zh: 找不到任何能支持我控诉的证据

translation.en: TWO MONTHS LATER, I WAS FIRED
translation.zh: 找不到任何能支持我控诉的证据 两个月后

translation.en: FOR POOR JOB PERFORMANCE.
translation.zh: 我因为工作表现不佳被开除了

translation.en: THEY WOULDN'T LET ME SAY GOOD-BYE TO ANYBODY.
translation.zh: 他们不让我跟任何人道别

translation.en: THEY WOULDN'T WRITE ME A LETTER OF RECOMMENDATION.
translation.zh: 也不给我写推荐信

translation.en: I WASN'T LOOKING FOR A PAYOFF.
translation.zh: 我并不是想要索求赔偿

translation.en: ALL I WANTED WAS FOR IT TO STOP.
translation.zh: 我并不是想要索求赔偿 我只想了结这件事

translation.en: CAN YOU HELP ME?
translation.zh: 你能帮我吗

translation.en: - UH, YES.
translation.zh: 能

translation.en: YES, I CAN.
translation.zh: 是的 我能

translation.en: - WHAT DO YOU NEED MY HELP FOR?
translation.zh: 你要我帮你做什么 等等 我能...

translation.en: - WAIT, CAN I JUST-- - NO, GIVE ME THE UPDATE.
translation.zh: 不能 告诉我最新进展

translation.en: - YOU KNOW, SHE'S A NICE WOMAN.
translation.zh: 她是个好女人

translation.en: SHE-- - ON THE CASE.
translation.zh: -她...-说案子的事

translation.en: I DON'T GET EMOTIONALLY ATTACHED TO THE CLIENT.
translation.zh: 我不会对客户投入个人情感

translation.en: - THIS WOMAN HAD HER LIFE RIPPED APART.
translation.zh: 这女人的生活已经支离破碎了

translation.en: YOU DON'T EVEN CARE?
translation.zh: 你一点都不关心吗

translation.en: - I'M NOT ABOUT CARING. I'M ABOUT WINNING.
translation.zh: 我不关心客户我只关心能不能赢

translation.zh: 我不关心客户我只关心能不能赢 为什么你不能两样都关心

translation.en: - I'D EXPLAIN IT TO YOU,
translation.zh: 我可以向你解释

translation.en: BUT THEN I'D HAVE TO CARE ABOUT YOU.
translation.zh: 但一解释 就代表我关心你了

translation.en: - RIGHT.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: WHAT ARE YOU DOING? DON'T TOUCH THAT.
translation.zh: 你做什么呢 别碰那个

translation.en: - I'M JUST CHECKING MY LOCK.
translation.zh: 我只是检查一下我的车锁

translation.en: - YOU RIDE YOUR BIKE TO...
translation.zh: 你骑车来...

translation.en: IT'S LOCKED, OKAY?
translation.zh: 是锁着的 好吗

translation.en: COME ON.

translation.zh: 如果没叫披萨的话

translation.zh: 本可以看得更快些

translation.en: SPEAKING OF WHICH, HAVE YOU EVER HAD

translation.en: THE CHEESE IN THE CRUST?
translation.zh: 你有没有吃过芝心披萨

translation.zh: 你有什么发现

translation.zh: 2005年3月12日有员工被解雇

translation.en: BUT THE FILE WITH THE EMPLOYEE NAME ON IT IS MISSING.
translation.zh: 但没有找到含有该员工姓名的文件

translation.zh: 我会去申请制裁他们的律师

translation.en: POSSIBLE JAIL TIME.
translation.zh: 他可能会被判刑

translation.en: GUY'S NOT GONNA KNOW WHAT HIT HIM.
translation.zh: 而且他不会知道错在哪里

translation.en: - DENNIS, IT'S HARVEY SPECTER.
translation.zh: 丹尼斯 我是哈维·斯佩克特

translation.en: DID YOU HAVE ANYTHING TO DO WITH THE MARCH 12th, 2005 FILES
translation.zh: 你有没有对2005年3月12日的文件

translation.en: LEFT OUT OF DISCOVERY?
translation.zh: 做什么手脚

translation.en: IF THEY'RE HERE BY NOON, I'LL BELIEVE YOU.
translation.zh: 如果中午前送过来 我就相信你

translation.en: IF NOT, WE'RE FILING FOR SANCTIONS.
translation.zh: 如果中午前送过来 我就相信你 不然 我们就申请制裁

translation.en: THREAT OF SANCTIONS IS BETTER THAN FILING FOR SANCTIONS.
translation.zh: 威胁要制裁永远比申请制裁有效

translation.en: - THAT'S WHAT I MEANT. THREATEN, NOT FILE.
translation.zh: 我就是说威胁 不是申请

translation.zh: 谁会真去申请

translation.en: - SHAVE.
translation.zh: 刮胡子

translation.zh: 听说过这个女人吗

translation.zh: 乔安娜·韦伯斯特

translation.en: - NO. WHY?
translation.zh: 没有 怎么了

translation.zh: 公司不想让我们找到她

translation.zh: 她2005年和人事部

translation.en: OVER WORK-RELATED ISSUES IN 2005,
translation.zh: 她2005年和人事部 谈过工作问题

translation.en: AND THEN THEY FIRED HER TWO MONTHS LATER.
translation.zh: 两个月后他们解雇了她

translation.en: - YOU THINK HUNT DID THE SAME THING TO HER

translation.zh: -那一套吗-对

translation.en: - THEN YOU HAVE TO MAKE HER COME FORWARD AND SAY SO.
translation.zh: 那你一定要让她出庭指证

translation.en: - YEAH. THAT'S THE PLAN.
translation.zh: 当然 就是这么打算的

translation.en: - OKAY.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: - ACTUALLY, BEFORE YOU GO,
translation.zh: 实际上 在你离开前

translation.zh: 能帮我签一下这个委托书吗

translation.en: EVIDENTLY IT'S SOMETHING YOU'RE SUPPOSED TO DO
translation.zh: 显然 这一开始

translation.en: AT THE BEGINNING. ( laughs )

translation.en: PERFECT. THANK YOU.
translation.zh: 好极了

translation.en: - THANK YOU.
translation.zh: 谢谢 谢谢你

translation.zh: 你是乔安娜·韦伯斯特吗

translation.en: - HI. MY NAME'S MIKE ROSS.
translation.zh: 有什么事吗 你好 我叫迈克·罗斯

translation.en: I'M A-- I'M A LAWYER.
translation.zh: 你好 我叫迈克·罗斯 我是名律师

translation.en: ABOUT YOUR TIME AT DEVLIN MCGREGGOR.
translation.zh: 我有些问题要问你 有关你在德夫林·迈克雷格的工作

translation.en: PLEASE. LOOK, JUST LET ME TELL YOU A STORY ABOUT MY CLIENT, OKAY?
translation.zh: 拜托听我讲讲我委托人的故事好吗

translation.en: - I'VE GOT TO GET THESE IN THE FRIDGE.
translation.zh: 拜托听我讲讲我委托人的故事好吗 我要把东西放冰箱

translation.zh: 我要把东西放冰箱 只要一会儿

translation.en: - FINE.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: - LOOK, ALL I NEED YOU TO DO IS TO TELL YOUR STORY. IF YOU CORROBORATE--

translation.en: - MR. ROSS, WHAT HAPPENED TO ME HAPPENED SIX YEARS AGO.
translation.zh: 罗斯先生 那事发生在六年前

translation.en: IT WAS HORRIBLE, AND THERE WAS A REASON I DIDN'T DO ANYTHING ABOUT IT.
translation.zh: 那事发生在六年前 不堪回首 我没采取措施是有原因的

translation.en: THEY'LL PUT ME ON THAT STAND AND ATTACK ME,
translation.zh: 出庭作证意味着要面对攻击

translation.en: AND I DON'T WANT THAT.
translation.zh: 我不想经受那些

translation.en: - MS. WEBSTER, JOANNA...
translation.zh: 韦伯斯特太太 乔安娜

translation.en: THIS MAN IS A PREDATOR,
translation.zh: 那男人到处拈花惹草

translation.zh: 如果你不帮忙阻止他 他还会继续下去

translation.en: ( sighs ) ALL YOU HAVE TO DO IS GIVE A DEPOSITION.
translation.zh: 你要做的只是出庭作证

translation.en: - I'M SORRY.
translation.zh: 对不起

translation.en: I CAN'T DO IT.
translation.zh: 我做不到

translation.zh: 和证人谈得怎么样

translation.zh: 我没成功...

translation.en: TO NOT BE AWESOME.
translation.zh: 停下迈向辉煌的步伐

translation.zh: 我说服她去作证了

translation.en: YOU SHOULD HAVE SEEN ME. I-I TRIED EVERYTHING.
translation.zh: 你真该看看那一幕 我什么都试了

translation.en: HE'D DO IT AGAIN, I'D BE WITH HER EVERY STEP OF THE WAY...
translation.zh: 我说他还会再犯 还说作证时我会一直陪着她

translation.en: NOTHING WORKED. AND THEN IT HIT ME.
translation.zh: 都没用 接着我灵光一闪

translation.en: I ASKED HER WHAT IF IT WAS HER DAUGHTER
translation.zh: 我问她 如果是她的女儿

translation.en: THAT HE DID THIS TO.
translation.zh: 遭遇到这种情况怎么办

translation.en: SHE MELTED.
translation.zh: 立马奏效了

translation.en: I CARED ABOUT HER. OH.
translation.zh: 我关心她

translation.en: YEAH. THANK YOU.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: - I'M GLAD TO SEE THAT STAYING UP ALL NIGHT
translation.zh: 熬通宵没把你熬成白痴

translation.en: DOESN'T MAKE YOU ACT LIKE A COMPLETE IDIOT.
translation.zh: 我感到很欣慰

translation.en: NOW GO HOME AND GET SOME SLEEP. - ( singsongy ) LA-LA-LA-LA... I DON'T WANT YOU WAVING THAT THING AROUND
translation.zh: 回家睡觉吧明天作证的时候

translation.en: DURING TOMORROW'S DEPOSITION.
translation.zh: 我可不想看你拿枪甩来甩去

translation.en: - HARVEY. HOW'S THE PRO BONO GOING?
translation.zh: 哈维 无偿服务案进行得怎样

translation.en: - GREAT.
translation.zh: 不错

translation.en: I JUST TALKED A WITNESS INTO TESTIFYING.
translation.zh: 刚刚说服一位证人出庭作证

translation.en: - REALLY? WHAT'S THE WITNESS'S NAME?

translation.zh: 你让别人接手了这案子

translation.en: - NEED I REMIND YOU THAT WHEN WE FIRST MET,

translation.en: LED YOU UP THE RANKS, AND THEN PAID FOR YOU TO GO TO HARVARD,

translation.en: WHERE, BY THE WAY,

translation.zh: 但我还是雇了你

translation.en: - AND YOU'VE BENEFITED FROM THAT EVER SINCE.
translation.zh: 之后你就不断获利啊

translation.zh: 你先是答应了我

translation.zh: 接着食言了

translation.zh: 还当着我的面对我撒谎

translation.zh: 这是私事

translation.en: AND I'LL TELL YOU SOMETHING ELSE.

translation.en: YOU MADE YOUR BED, YOU BETTER GODDAMN WIN.

translation.en: WHAT THE HELL IS WRONG WITH YOU? - I NEED THE BRIEFCASE BACK.
translation.zh: 你发什么神经 把那箱子还我

translation.en: - OH, SO THAT'S WHAT THIS HAS BEEN ABOUT, HUH?
translation.zh: 所以说你来我家乱翻

translation.en: YOU DON'T CARE ABOUT OUR FRIENDSHIP AT ALL.
translation.zh: 就是为了那箱子 你根本不在乎我们的友情

translation.en: - YOU'RE MY OLDEST FRIEND, AND YOU KNOW IT.
translation.zh: 你知道 你是我交情最久的朋友

translation.en: BUT YOU DON'T SEEM TO CARE ABOUT THAT ANYMORE,
translation.zh: 但你现在好像不在乎我们的友情了

translation.en: AND, YEAH, I NEED THE BRIEFCASE BACK.
translation.zh: 对 我想把箱子要回来

translation.en: AND I'M GONNA FIND IT, MIKE.
translation.zh: 我一定会找到的 迈克

translation.en: - WELL, I DITCHED IT WHEN I WAS RUNNING AWAY
translation.zh: 我躲警察的时候就扔了

translation.en: FROM THE COPS THAT YOU SENT ME INTO.

translation.en: - MIKE.

translation.zh: 我的隔间

translation.zh: 不行 现在是尿检时间

translation.zh: 我先回去放下东西

translation.en: - NOW.
translation.zh: 就现在

translation.zh: 对了 我侄子和你是哈佛同一届的

translation.zh: 我问他是否认识你

translation.zh: 很搞笑的是他说不认识

translation.zh: 他叫什么 米切尔·萨鲍格

translation.en: - YEAH. DON'T KNOW HIM.
translation.zh: 米切尔·萨鲍格 我也不认识他

translation.en: IT'S A BIG SCHOOL.
translation.zh: 学校很大的

translation.en: - NOT REALLY.
translation.zh: 其实不大

translation.en: - WE GET 7,000 APPLICATIONS A YEAR.
translation.zh: 我们每年会收到七千份申请

translation.zh: 第七名:米切尔·萨鲍格

translation.en: - OH, MITCHELL.
translation.zh: 是米切尔啊

translation.en: WITH THE SLICKED BACK HAIR,
translation.zh: 那个小背头

translation.en: GRADUATED SEVENTH IN THE CLASS.
translation.zh: 毕业考试排班上第七名的那个

translation.en: SURE. YEAH. I REMEMBER HIM.
translation.zh: 没错 我想起来了

translation.en: - TIME TO FACE THE MUSIC.
translation.zh: 快去做尿检吧

translation.en: - Donna: YEAH, WHAT'S UP?
translation.zh: 什么事

translation.en: - I GOT TO GET TO THE KENDRICK FILING.
translation.zh: 我要肯迪克的文档

translation.en: WHERE THE HELL IS MIKE?
translation.zh: 迈克去哪里了

translation.en: - I DON'T KNOW.
translation.zh: 不知道

translation.en: - LEAVE THE CUP ON THE COUNTER.
translation.zh: 到时候把杯子放在柜台上

translation.en: YOU'LL HAVE TO LEAVE THAT OUT HERE.
translation.zh: 你得把公文箱留在外面

translation.zh: -为什么-如果你带进去了

translation.en: I HAVE TO CHECK TO MAKE SURE YOU DON'T HAVE ANOTHER URINE SAMPLE IN IT. - ( laughs )
translation.zh: 我就得开箱检查以防里面有尿样

translation.en: - WHERE YOU BEEN? - HI. UM...
translation.zh: -你去哪里了-嗨

translation.en: GETTING DRUG TESTED, ACTUALLY.
translation.zh: 做药检去了

translation.en: - THE DEPOSITION'S THIS AFTERNOON.
translation.zh: 做药检去了 今天下午就要出庭作证了

translation.en: BEFORE THEY GET HERE, I WANT YOU TO GRILL THIS WOMAN
translation.zh: 今天下午就要出庭作证了 在他们过来之前 你要好好拷问那个证人的背景

translation.en: ABOUT HER BACKGROUND
translation.zh: 你要好好拷问那个证人的背景

translation.en: FOR ANYTHING THEY MIGHT USE AGAINST HER.
translation.zh: 别让他们找到把柄

translation.en: YOU GOT IT? - GOT IT.
translation.zh: -明白了吗-明白

translation.en: - MAKE HER TELL YOU EVERYTHING. - EVERYTHING.
translation.zh: -要面面俱到-面面俱到

translation.en: - EVERYTHING. - EVERYTHING.
translation.zh: -丝毫不漏-绝对不漏

translation.en: - OKAY. - OKAY.
translation.zh: -丝毫不漏-绝对不漏 -好-好

translation.en: - I HAD BEEN WORKING SIX MONTHS
translation.zh: 那时我上班已经六个月了

translation.en: WHEN MR. HUNT STARTED ASKING ME TO WORK MORE,
translation.zh: 亨特先生开始加大我的工作量

translation.en: ORDER DINNER.
translation.zh: 亨特先生开始加大我的工作量 晚餐叫外卖

translation.en: ONE NIGHT,
translation.zh: 晚餐叫外卖 有天很晚了

translation.en: LATE, HE TRIED TO HAVE SEX WITH ME.
translation.zh: 有天很晚了 他要和我发生性关系

translation.en: THE NEXT DAY, I REQUESTED A CHANGE IN ASSIGNMENTS.
translation.zh: 第二天 我就提出要求调职

translation.en: TWO MONTHS LATER I WAS FIRED FOR HAVING A BAD ATTITUDE.
translation.zh: 两月后我因为工作态度差而被解雇

translation.en: - THIS IS RIDICULOUS.
translation.zh: 太可笑了

translation.en: - WIPE THAT SMIRK OFF YOUR FACE.
translation.zh: 笑什么笑

translation.en: YOU'RE NOT EVEN SUPPOSED TO BE HERE.
translation.zh: 笑什么笑 你根本就不该在这里

translation.en: - MR. HUNT HAS EVERY RIGHT TO BE HERE.
translation.zh: 亨特先生有权出席

translation.en: NOW, MS. WEBSTER,
translation.zh: 韦伯斯特女士

translation.en: AFTER WORKING FOR DEVLIN MCGREGGOR,
translation.zh: 离开德夫林·迈克雷格公司后

translation.en: YOU THEN WENT ON TO WAITRESS AT HOOTERS, RIGHT?
translation.zh: 你去猫头鹰餐厅做了侍者 是吗

translation.en: - YES, I DID.
translation.zh: 对啊

translation.en: - A PLACE THAT ADVERTISES THE SEXUALITY OF ITS WAITSTAFF, CORRECT?
translation.zh: 那里以标榜员工性感而闻名对吧

translation.en: - YOU WILL HAVE TO ASK THEM THAT.
translation.zh: 那个你得去问店里

translation.en: - I'M ASKING YOU.
translation.zh: 我在问你

translation.en: - AND SHE'S NOT ANSWERING. MOVE ON.
translation.zh: 她拒绝回答 继续

translation.en: - MS. WEBSTER,
translation.zh: 韦伯斯特女士

translation.en: WOULD YOU SAY THAT YOU'RE A TRUTHFUL PERSON?
translation.zh: 你认为自己诚实吗

translation.en: - YES.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: - SO WHEN YOU SAID EARLIER THAT YOU HAD NEVER BEEN ARRESTED
translation.zh: 之前你说从未因罪被捕

translation.en: FOR A CRIME, YOU WERE SPEAKING THE TRUTH?
translation.zh: 之前你说从未因罪被捕 你说的是实话吗

translation.en: - YES. - YES, SO IN 1993 THEN
translation.zh: -是-好的 那1993年 在宾州柳林商场

translation.en: YOU WERE NOT ARRESTED FOR STEALING $1,000 WORTH OF JEWELRY
translation.zh: 那1993年 在宾州柳林商场 你没有偷窃过

translation.en: FROM THE WILLOW GROVE MALL IN PENNSYLVANIA?
translation.zh: 价值一千美金的珠宝吗

translation.en: - I WAS 17. THAT WAS ONE MISTAKE.
translation.zh: 我那时才17岁 还不懂事

translation.en: THOSE RECORDS WERE SUPPOSED TO BE SEALED.
translation.zh: 我那时才17岁 还不懂事 那记录应该被封存的

translation.en: - SO WHEN YOU SAY THOSE RECORDS WERE SEALED,
translation.zh: 那记录应该被封存的 你说记录被封存了

translation.en: WHAT YOU MEAN TO SAY IS YOU THOUGHT
translation.zh: 你说记录被封存了 就意味着可以通过撒谎来摆脱罪名

translation.en: YOU COULD GET AWAY WITH A LIE?
translation.zh: 就意味着可以通过撒谎来摆脱罪名

translation.en: - NO, THAT'S NOT IT.
translation.zh: 不是这样的

translation.en: YOU'RE MAKING IT SEEM DIFFERENT THAT IT IS.
translation.zh: 你这是在歪曲事实

translation.en: - I'M SORRY. YOU WERE ARRESTED IN YOUR PAST
translation.zh: 很抱歉 你有过前科

translation.en: AND YOU LIED ABOUT IT HERE UNDER OATH.
translation.zh: 还在宣了誓的情况下撒过谎

translation.en: IS THAT MAKING IT SEEM DIFFERENT THAN WHAT IT IS?
translation.zh: 这也是歪曲事实吗

translation.en: NO ANSWER. HMM, ALL RIGHT.
translation.zh: 不回答 好吧 那我问你

translation.en: LET ME ASK YOU THIS, SINCE YOU'VE LIED HERE ONCE,
translation.zh: 既然你之前在这里撒过谎

translation.en: WHAT'S TO MAKE US BELIEVE YOU'RE NOT LYING ABOUT MR. HUNT?
translation.zh: 我们该如何相信你没在亨特先生的事情上说谎呢

translation.en: - HOW THE HELL DID YOU MISS THAT ARREST?
translation.zh: 你怎么不知道她有前科

translation.en: - I DID EVERY BACKGROUND CHECK WE HAVE.
translation.zh: 我真的做了全面调查

translation.en: - DID YOU GRILL HER LIKE I TOLD YOU TO?
translation.zh: 我真的做了全面调查 有没有照我说的拷问她

translation.en: - IT WAS A SEALED RECORD, HARVEY!
translation.zh: 那记录是被封存的 哈维

translation.en: - GODDAMN IT, I KNEW IT.
translation.zh: 妈的 我就知道

translation.en: FIX IT.
translation.zh: 想办法补救

translation.en: - JOANNA! WAIT. PLEASE!
translation.zh: 乔安娜 等等 拜托

translation.en: - THIS IS WHY I DIDN'T WANT TO TESTIFY.
translation.zh: 乔安娜 等等 拜托 这就是我不想作证的原因

translation.en: THEY TWIST SOMETHING FROM 100 YEARS AGO
translation.zh: 这就是我不想作证的原因 他们会翻出一百年前老账
